resources.string: You find out all the positive cases!

In this game, you are trying to find the confirmed positive case of COVID-19 among a bunch of people who are quarantine.\nThe people in the same row or column means the have meet each other recently. When you ask them, you can find out that they are positive case or how many positive cases they meet recently. Try to find all the positive cases!

The earth with mask image come from: https://pixabay.com/vectors/virus-mask-coronavirus-disease-4999857/
The welcome page image from https://pixabay.com/photos/medicine-mask-coronavirus-doctor-5103043/
The virus icon come from https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/bacteria_2904134
The human icon come from: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/user_1077114
The trophy icon come from https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/trophy_3593584
You used %1$d scans in this game.
